channel.title: 🏢 FairPlay Joint Team, CREST, ENSAE Paris on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 FairPlay Joint Team, CREST, ENSAE Paris on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Reinforcement Learning with Lookahead Information
item.description: Provably efficient RL algorithms are designed to utilize immediate reward or transition information, significantly improving reward collection in unknown environments.
